# standardOutput

**Instance Property**

The standard output stream.

## Declaration

```swift
var standardOutput: FileHandle? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting to `nil` will bind the stream to `/dev/null`.

The default is `nil`.

## Standard Unix Streams

- **standardError**: The standard error stream.
- **standardInput**: The standard input stream.
title: standardOutput
